dct_title_s: The west-road from London to Bristol : and its branches to several of the principal towns, with their computed distances
dct_description_sm: Diagrammatic table of road distances, representing the route between London and Bristol. From: The theatre of the empire of Great-Britain ... by John Speed. London : printed for Thomas Basset ... and Richard Chiswel ... , 1676.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : printed for Thomas Basset ... and Richard Chiswel ... , 1676]
